title.rendered: Porinju Veliyath’s EQ India Fund buys stake in a much maligned food company

content.rendered:
Porinju Veliyath is one of the most well known investors in the Indian Stock Market. Today we bring to you news of his firm (EQ India Fund) acquiring 1,50,000 shares of a foods products company at Rs. 650.00. Please go through the video and decide whether investment in this company is something that you would be willing to consider.


Please watch this video to know more

Please remember investing is extremely risky and factors in a very high risk of capital erosion. Please exercise extreme caution while dealing in risk based assets.

None of the stocks mentioned here should be considered as recommendations to buy and one must consult their financial advisor prior to acting on any of the information presented herewith. The author does not hold a stake in the stock discussed.

title.rendered: Dolly Khanna buys stake in lesser known smallcap alcoholic beverages company

content.rendered:
Dolly Khanna is a revered name in the Indian investing community. Dolly Khanna’s portfolio is religiously followed and news of her entry in a counter is enough to herald positive days for any stock. Rajiv Khanna, her better half is the real architect behind her investing success and manages her portfolio with high acumen. In one of our previous videos we had presented Top 10 Stocks from Dolly Khanna’s Stock Portfolio 2018, today we present to you information on a new small-cap entry to Dolly Khanna’s Portfolio.

 

Please watch this video to know more

Please remember investing is extremely risky and factors in a very high risk of capital erosion. Please exercise extreme caution while dealing in risk based assets.

title.rendered: 10 Stocks from Rakesh Jhunjhunwala’s Stock Portfolio 2018

content.rendered:
Rakesh Jhunjhunwala also known as the Warren Buffet of India is probably the greatest stock investor in India. With a personal net worth of 3.1 Billion USD derived predominantly from stock market successes, he is widely followed and revered by stock enthusiasts, young and old alike. In one of our previous videos we had brought to you a list of top 10 stocks from Rakesh Jhunjhunwala’s portfolio 2017, today we bring to you a list of top 10 stocks from Rakesh Jhunjhunwala’s stock portfolio 2018. Please go through the list, and decide whether investment in these stocks is something that you would be willing to consider.
